title: North Carolina: First in Zeit 11/22: Rittenhouse, Lakers, Target, Al Jazeera, Mass Robberies, Oliver Stone
itunes:title: North Carolina: First in Zeit 11/22: Rittenhouse, Lakers, Target, Al Jazeera, Mass Robberies, Oliver Stone
description:
In this editon of North Carolina: First in Zeit, Jack and Miles discuss the Rittenhouse RetCon, the Lakers brawl, Target staying closed on Thanksgiving, Al Jazeera's list of backsliding democracies, mass robberies (or flashrobs, if you will), and Oliver Stone's new JFK documentary

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
